[[jaxb]]
= JAXB

[.badges]
[.badge-key]##Since Camel Quarkus##[.badge-version]##1.0.0-M5## [.badge-key]##JVM##[.badge-supported]##supported## [.badge-key]##Native##[.badge-supported]##supported##

Unmarshal XML payloads to POJOs and back using JAXB2 XML marshalling standard.

== What's inside

* https://camel.apache.org/components/latest/dataformats/jaxb-dataformat.html[JAXB data format]

Please refer to the above link for usage and configuration details.

== Maven coordinates

[source,xml]
----
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.apache.camel.quarkus</groupId>
    <artifactId>camel-quarkus-jaxb</artifactId>
</dependency>
----

Check the xref:user-guide/index.adoc[User guide] for more information about writing Camel Quarkus applications.
